name: Software Development UAE
description:
Softwaredevelopment.ae is a full-stack development company that specializes on custom software of any size and complexity.
With 230+ of passionate IT professionals, Softwaredevelopment.ae helps clients throughout the whole software solution lifecycle starting from requirements analysis through prototyping and development, testing and going live to post-launch support and maintenance.
We enjoy working on innovative projects for companies of all sizes ensuring their effective presence on relevant markets with powerful high-quality products.
Our services:
Custom mobile app development
iPhone and iPad apps
Android apps
Windows mobile apps
Cross-platform apps
Hybrid apps
Wearable apps
Custom software solutions 
Websites & Web apps
E-commerce
SaaS
Augmented Reality
BLE beacons indoor positioning
Internet-of-Things
Enterprise solutions
Business process automation
Service integration
Professional social networks
Data management systems
Prototyping and modules development
POS software
High load systems
